column5: FIGURED ID BETTER GET OUT BEFORE THE 3 DAYS OF RAIN FORECASTED  LOL WAS A PRETTY GOOD MORN!!! GOT 1 AND LOST ONE IN THE DARK  AND REST WERE AT SUN UP. HIT 3 TRIBS AND ONLY 1 WAS FISHABLE!!! MOST STILL PRETTY DIRTY!! LOTS OF COOKIE CUTTER SIZED ONES TODAY. AND 1 MONSTER OUT OF NO WHERE(ABOUT 15LBS) THE ONE IN THE DARK(THAT DIDNT GET AWAY  LOL)  FEW OF THE COOKIES     NICE FRESH CHROME   AND THE BIG BOY
nicely done......im sitting at my desk sulking right now, LOL .....you have PM !!!
very nice,congrats
very nice fish WTG
Very impressive Scott. Do they get much bigger than that out of the tribs? WTG!
Great job
Great Catch!!!!! Just joined the site, and this is the first post. Unbelievable!!  Where did u catch these fellas? east end i assume?
BEST IVE EVER CAUGHT ROY WAS 22LBS. TX ALL
Nice job man!
Nice work!! Man I hate having to sleep after night shifts.  RF
Those are some nice looking fish WTG By the way do you work for John at Tightlines i am sure i seen you there before  Rob
IM AT TIGHTLINES ALL THE TIME!!! JUST WORK THE SHOWS FOR JOHN
Copper nice Jack bud. That is a "cracker Jack".   Good to see you persistence payed off. Rain tomorrow and most the weekend so back to your x-box. Cheers Al
Nice job CC You put the RR float reel in the mud. LOL
Nice Scott ... I think tomorrow might work
Nice Fish!

My name is Scott and I have the same shoulder bag too.......sweet.....  Too bad I'm not closer to better rivers right now.....I went to the Maitland and nothing happening yet.......walked 21 to the train bridge and up the other side, ony 2 fish, talked to about 10guys.....Too high and fast.....lots of fish upstream, and I'll be in Montreal when the fishing is going to be at it's best.......GO HABS!!!!!!!!!!!!!
WOW! Awesome fish CC. I have got to learn how to do that!
Oooh I am jealous! WTG CC!  That is a superb fish!
Well done as usual!  How long do you reckon before the rivers will be fish-able again after this weekend's rain?

One more question. Do you think there will be any Steel left in the open sections after this rain or will they all be up. I assume the open sections will be empty of any chrome.  Drop-backs from here on in?
TX ALL 30MM THERE CALLIN FOR JONNY AND IM NOT SURE HOW MUCH IS LEFT UP TOP TO MELT BUT A FEW GOOD DAYS ATLEAST!!! PRETTY SAFE TO SAY THE WEEKEND WILL BE A WASH OUT!!!
Great job again CC!  Yep...levels are rising and mudding up as we speak.  The board wasn't the same when you were not posting reports...all is right again in the world....LOL.

Excellent report and nice pics. I got out and tried several spots yesterday but no luck for me, well, I did set a new personal best but trees don't count for much LOL. It was still nice to get out and a beautiful day with some excellent company!
nice fish and great report cc....
